job.job_description: We are looking for a high-performing Account Executive to sell our industry-leading real estate software to customers outside the top 500. Your focus will be on exceeding quota, selling high-quality deals that drive long-term value, and ensuring strong customer retention. You’ll own the full sales cycle—from prospecting to closing—while working closely with internal teams to set customers up for success.  WHAT YOU’LL DO: Identify and close new business with brokerage customers below the top 500.  Own the full sales cycle, ensuring a smooth transition from prospect to customer.  Position our solutions as critical to brokerage operations, focusing on long-term customer value.  Maintain a strong pipeline and consistently exceed sales targets.  Work collaboratively with internal teams to support a seamless onboarding process.  Leverage your industry knowledge and relationships to drive growth.  Kee Apply now and work remotely at Lone Wolf Technologies
